extension.summary: Fork of the ExtendedInfo script from phil65
extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions and OpenMeta for library functions.
extension.news: 6.2.4 - Specify param in TV Show ID 6.2.3 - Fix TV Show trailers 6.2.2 - Added ability to search using the tvdb_id for "extendedepisodeinfo" 6.2.1 - Fix context menu now available for widgets pointing to OpenInfo's video addon items 6.2.0 - Added context menu force "player select" to the play button, available via "c" and long press "enter" button
